title: Understanding NSSI
text: Nonsuicidal Self-Injury (NSSI) involves behaviors where individuals intentionally harm themselves without the intention of ending their lives.

title: Differentiating NSSI from Suicidal Behavior
text: While both involve self-harm, NSSI is distinct from suicidal behavior because the intent is not to cause death.

hintAnswer: deliberate $$self-inflicted$$ harm that is not intended to result in death
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes NSSI?
choices: deliberate $$self-inflicted$$ harm that is not intended to result in death
deliberate $$self-inflicted$$ harm that is intended to result in death
